ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Preparations containing substances with antigenic properties administered to activate the immune system, thereby inducing an immune response.:put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.:At some point in a given period of time.:The state or condition of having a developing embryo or fetus in the body (uterus), after union of an ovum and spermatozoon, during the period from conception to birth.:The potential future harm that may arise from some present action. It is often combined or confused with the probability of an event which is seen as undesirable.

Concepts.definition: Preparations containing substances with antigenic properties administered to activate the immune system, thereby inducing an immune response.
put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.
At some point in a given period of time.
The state or condition of having a developing embryo or fetus in the body (uterus), after union of an ovum and spermatozoon, during the period from conception to birth.
The potential future harm that may arise from some present action. It is often combined or confused with the probability of an event which is seen as undesirable.
